text_body: There are no direct advantages or disadvantages to you as a
result of participating in the study, but your participation will
assist us in developing a better understanding of how the brain is
The results of the research will be presented at conferences and
written up in journals. Results are normally presented in terms of
groups of individuals. If any individual data are presented, the
data will be totally anonymous, without any means of identifying the
It is up to you to decide whether to take part. If you do decide to
take part, you will be asked to give your consent.
